company.tagline: The future of home help is here
company.description: Figure is the first-of-its-kind AI robotics company bringing a general purpose humanoid to life. After testing Figure in the workforce, it was reimagined for home use, introducing numerous improvements for a more user-friendly experience.

funding_rounds.source: Figure Announces Strategic Partnership with Brookfield

recent_partnerships: Figure Announces Strategic Partnership with Brookfield
recent_products: Scaling Helix: a New State of the Art in Humanoid Logistics
BotQ: A High-Volume Manufacturing Facility for Humanoid Robots
growth_metrics.revenue_info: Figure Exceeds $1B in Series C Funding at $39B Post-Money Valuation

events.title: Figure Exceeds $1B in Series C Funding
events.description: Figure has announced that it has exceeded $1 billion in Series C funding, achieving a $39 billion post-money valuation.

events.title: Figure Announces Strategic Partnership with Brookfield
events.description: Figure has entered into a strategic partnership with Brookfield to enhance its operational capabilities.

events.title: Introducing Figure 03
events.description: Figure 03 was officially introduced, featuring improvements for home use, including a softer design.

events.title: Scaling Helix: a New State of the Art in Humanoid Logistics
events.description: The new Helix product aimed to advance humanoid logistical capabilities was launched.

events.title: BotQ: A High-Volume Manufacturing Facility for Humanoid Robots
events.description: Figure established a high-volume manufacturing facility named BotQ to scale production of humanoid robots.

events.title: Helix: A Vision-Language-Action Model for Generalist Humanoid Control
events.description: The Helix model was developed to enhance generalist control for humanoid robots.

events.title: Helix Accelerating Real-World Logistics
events.description: The Helix program made significant strides in improving real-world logistic applications.

events.title: F.03 Battery Development
events.description: Ongoing development of the battery for the F.03 humanoid robot was confirmed.

events.title: Natural Humanoid Walk Using Reinforcement Learning
events.description: A crucial milestone achieved in teaching humanoid robots to walk using reinforcement learning techniques.

events.title: F.01 Takes Its First Steps
events.description: The first generation robot F.01 took its first steps, setting a foundation for future humanoid developments.

funding_rounds.source: Figure Announces Strategic Partnership with Brookfield
